title: LakshX
description: A multi-tenant Kanban platform with role-based access, real-time collaboration, and powerful analytics.
longDescription: A multi-tenant Kanban platform with role-based access, real-time collaboration, and powerful analytics.
mission:
LakshX is built for high-velocity teams that need to cut through the noise. It is a multi-tenant Kanban platform that integrates company-wide intelligence via RAG-powered search, automated meeting transcriptions, and an intelligent engineering calendar. 

With features like Dual-View Kanban (Board & Table), Live Analytics, and smart automations, LakshX transforms project management from a chaotic chore into a streamlined, intuitive process.

title: Anvesh
description: An automated intelligence engine that hunts for high-value businesses with zero online presence.
longDescription: An automated intelligence engine that hunts for high-value businesses with zero online presence.
mission:
Anvesh is an automated intelligence engine designed to identify opportunities where businesses lack digital footprints. By hunting for high-value businesses with zero online presence, it enables targeted outreach and growth strategies.

Built to empower freelancers and small agencies worldwide, Anvesh acts as a force multiplier, providing professional-grade tools to discover untapped markets without the high costs typically associated with enterprise intelligence platforms.
